Description: At The Elms, you'll find the space and location you desire and the comfort you deserve in a beautifully landscapped setting. The Elms at Oakton is located across the street from the Oak Marr Recreation Center. Oak Marr Rec Center offers an Olympic-sized indoor pool, health and fitness classes and a driving range with par 3 golf courses. The Elms at Oakton is conveniently located near Tysons Corner, Fair Oaks Mall, I-66 and the Capital Beltway. If metro access is a must have, you'll enjoy knowing that the Vienna Metro Station (Orange Line) is just 2 miles from our community & the Metro Bus will pick you up & drop you off at the community. In every way, you'll find the complete lifestyle you deserve and the balance you've been looking for. An Award winning team of professionals consistently delivers a warm and genuine approach to caring for our residents. The Elms team is not just committed to providing an exceptional customer experience, we work to build a sense of community.

Description: Oakton Park Apartments offers beautiful, sought-after one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes. Close to everything! We're conveniently located just off of I-66 and Route 123, Tyson's Corner, and Fair Oaks Mall. We're 30 minutes from downtown D.C., 40 minutes from Dulles Airport, and just five minutes from Vienna Metro! Oakton Park Apartments features all this convenience, yet we're tucked away on beautifully landscaped acreage in a quiet corner of Fairfax so you can get away from it all. And it keeps getting better: ALL UTILITIES are INCLUDED! Every apartment home has usable square footage throughout and some even feature a separate breakfast nook area in addition to an already large dining room. Our apartment homes have massive master bedrooms with large walk-in closets and spacious living rooms which open onto a private balcony or patio with secluded views and a gourmet kitchen. Our apartment homes offer you a choice of plush carpeting throughout with neutral color schemes or beautiful rich hardwood floors. The optional Designer Series package offers sophisticated style and added elegance to our apartment homes. Please ask a leasing specialist for details. Pets are family too! We welcome small pets and, in fact, many of our residents just love taking them around the wonderful park-like setting surrounding our community. In addition, Oakton Park Apartments includes an Olympic-size pool and three playgrounds. ALL UTILITIES are INCLUDED!!

Description: The Lincoln at Fair Oaks is conveniently located near Rte. 50, I-66 and the Fairfax County Parkway. You will be impressed by the stone-masonry architecture and various amenities. Space will surround you throughout your apartment that may have an optional sunroom or garage. Relax by the pool or utilize the club room or business center. The Lincoln at Fair Oaks will provide you the extra pleasures you deserve with the most conveniences at your fingertips. We now offer short-term/corporate apartments! * Apartments in Fairfax, VA 22030 * History of Fairfax, VA * The stately antebellum homes and historic buildings from the early 1800s tell the story of a city that grew from Civil War strife to a thriving urban center. Structures that reflect the past include the Fairfax County Courthouse, Ratcliffe-Allison House, Ford House and Truro Rectory. These are celebrated landmarks reminiscent of the Confederacy, tobacco plantations and the strong foothold of the church parish. During the 1900s, the trolley connected Fairfax to Washington, DC and today Fairfax is recognized as a suburb of the District of Columbia. * Apartments in Fairfax, VA 22030 are surrounded by the city's cultural heritage. The Fairfax Museum and Visitor Center is housed in one of the city's oldest buildings and once served as an elementary school. The Huddleson Library and Fairfax Art League functions out of the Old Town Hall built in 1900. The National Register of Historic Places can identify other notable venues. * The 22030 Economy * The Fairfax population earns a high median household income, reflective of a strong job market and top-notch schools. In this zip code, a higher percentage of residents have earned a bachelor's degree or higher as compared to the Virginia average. Major employers in the area include SunTrust, Federal Technology Services, Verizon Wireless, Fairfax Nursing Center and Fairfax Honda. * On the outskirts of the city are the Northern Virginia Community College and George Mason University. On the university campus stands the Center for the Arts complex, Aquatic and Fitness Center and Recreation Sports Complex. * Recreation and Dining in Fairfax * Walking trails and parks abound near apartments for rent in Fairfax, VA 22030. There are also many opportunities to appreciate the cultural arts, including music, theater, and dance. Annual events include the Chocolate Lover's Festival, Fairfax Spotlight on the Arts, National Trails Day, Irish Festival, Fall for the Book Festiva

Description: Is there such a thing as too much? We think the question is: What do you want to do first? Lounge by the pool? Mix and mingle in the courtyard? Or invite your friends over for games in the resident lounge? (We like to think of it as sharing, not showing off.) Whatever tickles your fancy, when you live here, you actually get to enjoy more of itnot just because you are close to everything, but because your new home is all thatand then some. Here is the quick and short of it: It is all about access, and you have itfrom easy commutes to DC, to even easier shopping at Wegmans, Whole Foods, Tysons Corner and more. We have lots and lots of space with open layouts, high 9 ceilings, dens and lofts. And a slew of studio, one- and two-bedroom floor plans to choose from. So pick the one that suits your lifeand simply stretch out and relax. Let us just say that our finishes and design rival what you would expect to find at top-of-the-line condo buildings. From kitchens boasting quartz countertops, custom 42 shaker cabinets and chefs islands to bathrooms with framed mirrors and sleek tile surround, you are poised to have it all.

Description: Pinewood Plaza in Fairfax, VA offers spacious studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep - MetroBus 29K & 29N stop here. 1 block to 29E & 29X and CUE green route. 5 minutes to I-495 (Capital Beltway) and 10 minutes to I-66. 10 minutes to Fairfax County Government Center or George Mason University. Short walking distance to lots of great places for every day living – grocery stores, shopping, dry cleaners, gyms, restaurants, and entertainment. 100’s more shops and services on Route 236 and Pickett Rd. 10 minutes to great public parks with trails, lakes, courts and fields. Apartment amenities include a large living area with space for lots of furniture, separate dining area with ceiling fan, covered balcony or patio, tons of closet space, wonderful natural light from windows (we provide blinds throughout), views of landscaped courtyards and grounds, and central heat and air conditioning. Gas for cooking & heating water is included your rent – you pay electricity and water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck, large play area, laundry and mailing delivery in each building, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.pinewoodplaza.com.

Description: Bell Fair Oaks raises the bar on the standard of luxury living in the affluent D.C area. Our recently renovated and redesigned Fairfax Va. Apartments set themselves apart from all other area residences. Bask in the luxury living only an apartment in Fairfax, VA can offer just outside the greater D.C area. Bell Fair Oaks is proud to offer upscale 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments all conveniently located near I-66 and other various entertainment venues and malls. This historical city was settled back in the early 1800's and was the scene of the earliest battles of the civil war. Due to its rich culture and history Fairfax, VA is full of arts and culture. With such events as the much anticipated Chocolate Lovers Festival, Fairfax Civil War Day and the favorite Irish Festival. there is never a shortage of exciting things to do or see in Fairfax, VA. Our apartments in Bell Fair Oaks place you just outside of the greater D.C area full of many employment opportunities. With notable employers such as SunTrust, Verizon Wireless, and ExxonMobil there are ample employment opportunities. Also, Fairfax lies just outside the greater D.C area, giving residents an easy commute to many employers in the area while being just outside all the hustle and bustle of big city life. In addition to easy access to many employment options and cultural attractions Bell Fair Oaks newly renovated Fairfax apartments offer many amenities and unique features. In addition to its patio's and balcony's, an apartment at Bell Fair Oaks offers an upscale 24/7 fitness center and newly renovated stainless steel appliances complete with decadent granite counter tops. Bell Fair Oaks also offers loft homes with a contemporary touch and premium amenities such as Whirlpool black appliance packages, vinyl wood-inspired flooring, and beautiful nickel fixtures. Bell Fair Oaks has a walkability score of 64 out of 100 and a close proximity to many eateries and other attractions offering many options to walk and explore the historical city of Fairfax, VA. An apartment in Fairfax, VA provides opportunities to walk to nearby Whole Foods, Restaurants, Coffee shops, Bars, Groceries, and parks. If that's not enough there are nearby transit offering opportunities to ride around and further explore city life. Description: The Courts at Fair Oaks, located in picturesque Fairfax, VA, offers apartment living at its finest! When you settle in at this gated community, you'll enjoy amenity-rich one- or two-bedroom apartments for rent that feature a full-size washer/dryer in your apartment, plus open floor plans and high ceilings. Relax by taking a swim in our large pool, working out in the fitness center, or playing a match with friends on our tennis courts. You'll also enjoy our clubhouse, landscaped picnic areas, scenic vistas, and even a community herb garden. * Located in desirable Fairfax County, The Courts at Fair Oaks is near Government Center, major expressways, Dulles International Airport, and the Vienna Metro Station (Orange Line), making your travel plans and daily commute a breeze! You'll live an exciting lifestyle, too, with the Fair Oaks Mall, Cinema, and countless restaurants just moments from home!

Description: It's past "up and coming." It's already here. It's Modera Mosaic, right in the heart of the Mosaic District in upscale Merrifield, Virginia. Outside you'll see an artful approach in the contemporary architecture featuring clean lines, and brick and metal paneling. Inside you'll see a sophisticated style in the European cabinets, quartz countertops, and stainless steel appliances. We know Northern Virginians love convenience. We do too! The Mosaic District - where you can walk to Merrifield's best shops, restaurants, and the metro. So whether you want to take a 10 minute drive to Tysons Corner, or walk across the street to the Angelika Film Center, there's always something to do. Even when you "stay in" you'll feel like you're doing something, as your options include things like getting a tan at the pool overlooked by the clubhouse, relaxing by the courtyard fire pit, or checking Facebook in the cyber cafe. We're just getting started.

Description: For luxury and convenience without compromises, look no further than Camden Monument Place in Fairfax, VA. We offer studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes complete with upgrades such as spacious walk-in closets, granite countertops, hardwood-style floors, large soaking tubs, crown molding, French doors, full size-washers and dryers, garage parking and more. Choose the lifestyle you want by taking advantage of our 24-hour fitness center with kids' playroom, resort-style pool with WiFi and sundeck, outdoor social space with grilling stations and many fun-filled resident events year round. Camden Monument Place sits near Fairfax and D.C.'s culture and cuisine destinations such as Regional Fair Oaks Mall, Fair Lakes Shopping Center, Fairfax Corner, Patriot Center at George Mason University and more. Experience resort-style living 24/7 at Camden Monument Place! Please note that all floor plan availability is subject to change. Call for details.

Description:
Bright, spacious 1 bed 1 bath with VERY high ceilings at Halstead at the Metro. Across the street from Dunn Loring Metro, 24 hours grocery, and next building gym and office. Short walk to Mosaic Shopping District... restaurants and bars are just outside your door!
UNIT:
- Airy, high 11.5 ft ceilings
- FIRST parking spot in front of garage entry - parking included
- Closest unit to gym, office pool, and BBQ area
- End unit, very quiet - no basement neighbors
- Stainless steel appliances, granite kitchen counters
- In-unit laundry and spacious laundry room
- Patio, private and facing courtyard 
- Storage unit included, temperature-controlled
AREA:
- Across the street from Dunn Loring Metro - Orange Line and24 hr grocery
- Restaurants and bars nearby
- 5 min. walk to Mosaic District and Target
- 1 mile to W&OD Trail
- Easy drive to Tysons Corner, I-66, 495 Beltway, and Rt. 29
- Close to I-NOVA hospital, fire department, Merrifield Post Office, Rec Center and Library 
Utilities and internet not included. Move-in fee (and move-out) required and not included. No pets, no smoking.

Description:
Spacious condo on 2nd floor available immediately at safe, convenient and quiet Fair Oaks location. 
The unit includes a master bedroom with double vanity bath and 2 generous walk-in closets, granite countertops in the kitchen with breakfast area, built in bookshelves, balcony with storage closets and more!
Walk to Fair Lakes shopping, Whole Foods, Fair Oaks Mall.
Central location with easy commuting to Rt 50, Rt 66, Rt 286 and George Mason University. 
Unit comes with 1 reserved parking space and ample street parking. 
Water and trash included in rent.
Community pool, workout center and tennis courts included. 
Building includes elevator and secure entry.
Minimum 1 year lease required.

Description:
Modern 2 bedroom 2 bathroom luxury apartment for rent in secure upscale Halstead II community across from Dun Loring metro station. Unit is available September 01 2017
No Pets or Smokers. 2 indoor parking spaces close to entrance. $2100 with security deposit. New Hardwoods and carpet throughout. Please call 202 359 3155 for viewing. Apartment Features -- 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, Larger entry foyer with closet - 1225 Sq Feet living space
*	Gourmet Kitchen
*	42" Artisan Cherry Cabinets *	Kitchen bar *	Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances
*	Imported Granite Countertops *	Recessed and pendant lighting *	Berber Carpeting *	Italian Tile floors *	Full size washer and dryer *	9" Ceiling in all rooms Split bedroom floor plan Custom paint throughout Full size washer and dryer Walk-in closets in both bedrooms Installed closet organizers in walk in closets 2 Assigned parking space close to entrance and under cover from elements
Best floor-plan location near parking entrance, mail elevator, and exit to metro The unit also comes with in building separate storage unit *	75 Sq Ft
*	7/24 Storage Room Access
*	Electronic Key Card Security Community Amenities *	Sparkling pool, sundeck, and spa *	Men's and Women's Locker rooms *	Indoor Basketball Court *	Large fitness center with cardio theater, machines, and free-weights *	Sports pub with pool table and 5 flat screen TVs *	Party room with bar, couches, tables *	Library room to read/study *	Business center with 4 computers, fax, and lounge *	24/hr security office and package receiving *	Community events such as wine tastings, ballroom dancing lessons, social gatherings, etc Neighborhood Amenities *	2- minute walk to food: Harris Teeter and a wide variety of Dun Loring metro restaurants Lost Dog Cafe , Panera Bread, Noodles, Silver Diner, Five Guys, Coldstone, Sweetwater Tavern, Unos's, Chevy's *	10 minute drive to Arlington, Clarendon, and Ballston *	5 minute drive to Tysons Corner, Vienna, or Fairfax *	2 minute drive to 495, 66, or 50 *	5 minute drive to INOVA Fairfax and Exxon *	5 minute drive to golf course and county park *	3 blocks from Home Depot *	Across the street from metro Leave your car at home.
*	Location provides less dependence on a car
*	Shopping, dining, recreation onsite
*	Metrorail and Metrobus next door
*	Community Zipcar car sharing program - Zipcar members report an average monthly savings of more than $600 compared to car ownership.
*	Electric car charging stations in the community
*	Bike racks and storage At Halstead II, everything is well within reach. There's an eclectic mix of shopping and dining downstairs, the Dunn Loring Metro next door, and plenty of picturesque spots in between. Just beyond the vibrant, pedestrian-friendly neighborhood are even more enticing possibilities. More restaurants and bars, grocery stores, and entertainment venues. You'll also enjoy easy access to all the major roadways. When it comes to convenience, Halstead II is the optimum location.. Now Open: Lost Dog Cafe, & Noufal Hair Color and Spa, Jimmy Johns,Passion Fin 10 min walk - Major Retail Mosaic Center has just opened with an amazing variety of retail, and dining options. For more details go to http://mosaicdistrict.com ++++++++++++++

Description: This 2nd floor Corner Unit has been meticulously maintained, is freshly painted, with new carpeting throughout. It has great windows and lots of light. The kitchen has recessed lighting. The laundry room, with washer and dryer has added cabinets and a chest freezer. There is a workbench in the garage. The building has a security entrance and there is a elevator.

Description:
Abundant space, great location!
Condo for rent near Fairfax City, Cue Bus, Metro - available September
About 9720 Kingsbridge Dr Fairfax, VA 22031
Utilities included - $1,750 month, 2 BR Second-floor 2 BR/1.5 BA condo with new refrigerator, new flooring throughout, updated bathrooms, freshly painted, non smoking. Condo fee is included and PAYS FOR ALL UTILITIES except a small light bill which averages around $45/month. Available September 1st. Condo has lots of natural lighting, a spacious kitchen with separate dining room, large living room, master bedroom with walk-in closet, and spacious second bedroom. Also fealtured is a laundry room with full size washer and dryer, and balcony overlooking beautifully groomed common area with swimming pool. 
Nearby schools include Mosby Woods Elementary. Luther Jackson Middle School. Oakton High School. Two off-street parking passes plus one visitor pass included. Additional temporary parking passes are available from the condo office when needed. Community includes Swimming Pool, Community Center, Tot Play Area, and Picnic Tables with Grills. Located one mile from the Vienna metro. Draper Drive Park is less than a mile away. 
Condo fee is paid by the owner and includes heat, a/c, hot and cold water, sewage, and trash removal. Tenant pays electricity for appliances, lights, etc, which averages around $45/month. Feel free to cal or text. show contact info
Features
Washer/Dryer
Pets OK
Off Street parking 
Lease Length - 12 Months
Contact
703-864-7591
571-499-8946

Open floor plan with lot of lights in the unit. Fans in all bedrooms. TH overlooking park. Nice new community with park for kids to play just in front of the unit. Washer / Dryer in the Unit. Granite counter top. Black Appliances. Small Deck for relaxation.Tenant responsible for all utilities. Credit check will be done.

Description: Great bones with an awesome facelift! Your next home was recently renovated. Completely new kitchen, floors, bathrooms and basement. This home is a great starter home for a young family. This 4-bedroom home is in a fantastic location close to the newly developed Mosaic District (https://mosaicdistrict.com/) and the heart of Vienna. The home, which in a quiet cul-de-sac, is in an awesome neighborhood. We have plenty of amenities within walking distance (Pan Am Shopping Center, Vienna Metro and 2 state parks with trails). This home also has a ton of natural light and is ideal for commuters. The home is located near many major highways (66, 496, 50, 29) and close to 2 metro stops (Dunn Loring and Vienna). This home is a commuters paradise! Detailed Description: -	Walkout basement with kitchenette (fridge, microwave and stovetop) - Basement includes a master bedroom with a full bathroom -Private backyard. -3-Bedrooms on the 2nd floor and 2 full bathrooms (Newly renovated) -	Spacious master bedroom with a ceiling fan -2 large closets -	Gorgeous new kitchen with stainless steel appliances -New HVAC Unit - Central A/C with WIFI thermostat -	New Washer and Dryer -New Light fixtures

Description: Located in the renowned Fairfax, VA County Public School District, East Meadow Apartments offers quality one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments for rent. Each features a fully equipped kitchen, separate dining room, washer/dryer, ceramic-tile baths, extra storage space, and off-street parking, as well as walk-in closets in select apartments. Newly renovated apartments are also available. Our modern clubhouse is the perfect spot for community parties, or you can enjoy a workout in the on-site fitness center. Spend time relaxing poolside, picnicking with friends, and strolling our beautifully landscaped grounds with your pet. * These Northern Virginia apartments are conveniently located for Capital commuters, too, with easy access to I-495, U.S. Route 50, Route 66, Route 28, and a nearby bus to the Metro Station. You'll also have plenty to do in your free time Fair Oaks Mall and Greenbriar Shopping Center are just a few minutes from the door of your new apartment rental!

Description: BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED BRICK HOME! GORGEOUS OPEN CONCEPT KITCHEN/LIVING/DINING ROOM! Large Kitchen Island! Vaulted ceilings! Beautiful bathrooms w/granite and ceramic tile.2 high efficiency wood burning stoves. Brick Patio! Quiet Corner Lot w/Huge Yard - almost 1 acre! 3 bedrooms w/private baths! Great location! Easy drive to Vienna Metro or VRE. Close to Fairfax City events shops & GMU.

Description: Commuters Dream Location! Luxury 3 Bedroom Townhouse just yards to Vienna Metro & Major Commuting Routes! Bright & Open floor-plan includes hardwood flooring on main level large family room off kitchen deck lower level recreation room & patio. Recent upgrades include granite counter-tops hot water heater HVAC & Washing Machine. Great Shopping Dining & More within minutes! Must See!

Description: Home nestled on a beautiful wooded lot on quiet cul-de-sac-Hardwood Floors on Main Level-Carpets on Upper and Lower Levels-Kitchen w/granite counters-Finished W/O Lower Level-FP in Living Room-Newer A/C--Two car Garage-VRE Minutes away-Metro approx 15 minutes-Owner will consider a small pet-Plenty of shopping close by.

* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Microwave
* Refrigerator

Description: A taste of nature in the city with excellent location Just off Old lee highway across from golf course minutes to metro and downtown Fairfax City; this handsome brick colonial offers you large bedrooms with lots of closet space open kitchen with breakfast area & separate dining room. Lots of natural light from the wall of sliding glass doors. Great deck & balcony with nature views all around.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher

* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Gorgeous, updated 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath end unit townhouse backing to trees in Fair Woods! - Freshly painted throughout! With 3 finished levels, this brick front unit is located on a serene, landscaped fenced lot with a large wood patio. Hardwood floors throughout the sunny foyer, spacious living and dining room, with upgraded double hung vinyl windows. Lovely eat-in kitchen complete with granite counters and stainless steel appliances and pantry. All bathrooms have been updated! Fully finished lower level has cozy rec room with fireplace and full bath. Master bedroom complete with large walk-in closet. Great amenities, convenient location, shopping and more! NO smoking. A small pet will be considered on a case-by-case basis. LB Application & LB Lease required.
(RLNE3588425) Other Amenities - Yard, Deck.

Description:
(571) 969-4003 - Beautiful townhome on corner lot. Great Location - Property Id: 37919
Video walkthrough available at https://youtu.be/XB3VWSILhFc
Lower Level: Garage + Rec.room (Home theater ready) + Laundry + Full bathroom
Main Floor: Living room + Kitchen + Family Room + Dining area + 1/2 Bathroom
Second Floor: 3 bedrooms + 2 Full Baths
Garage: 2 car garage. Room for 2 cars in driveway. Additional guest parking.
Deck: approx 20'x 10 with access stairs from back.
Great features:
1. Rec. room at ground level is home theater ready. Centralized wiring for TV in family room. 
2. Quiet, safe and family friendly neighborhood
3. Uniquely located in middle of Fair Oaks mall, Fairfax Town Center, and Fair Lakes (all less than 2 miles)
4. Corner lot. Quiet deck with lots of privacy. 
5. Ample sun light. Windows on 3 sides of the house.
6. Wired for centrally controlled home theater system (rec. room and main floor)
7. Gas fire place
8. Open kitchen layout with granite counter tops and huge island, great for entertaining
9. Whirlpool tub + double vanity
Apply at TurboTenant: http://rent.turbotenant.com/properties/4129-brookgreen-dr 
Property Id 37919
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3586303) Other Amenities - Other- Cable Ready. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Other- Freezer. Lease lengths - 12 Months. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Pets Allowed.

Description:
(571) 276-2426 - Updated 3 Bedroom Townhouse Styled Condo w/ Garage in the Gates of Fair Lakes - Very nice 3 Bedroom/ 3 Bathroom townhouse located in the Gates of Fair Lakes! 
Gated community with amenities including fitness/business center, outdoor pool & grilling area. Located right off Fair Lakes Parkway. Walking Distance to Fair Lakes Shopping Center!
Spacious bedrooms, all with plenty of closet space. Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom.
Newer appliances. Updated kitchen with granite countertops. Open concept living room and dining room. Hardwood floors throughout main level and plus carpeting on bedroom levels. 
Great Schools!
Greenbrier Elementary School
Lanier Middle School
Fairfax High School
Date Available: 11/01/2017
Lease Term: 12 - 24 Months
Security Deposit: $2175
Pet deposit $500 per pet 
Qualifications: 2 years of full-time employment history, 2 years of rental history (or home ownership), good credit, household income at least $87,000.
NO SECTION 8 / NO HOUSING VOUCHERS.
Listed by Karen Whitby, Realtor.
For information and showings call/text Karen at (571)276-2426
or email karen@bhgpremier.com with your questions.

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Open & airy 1 bedroom, 1 bath Fairfax condo close to the Vienna Metro!! - New wood flooring in the entryway, kitchen and dining room! Totally remodeled bathroom! Top level unit complete with a lovely balcony overlooking the serene courtyard. Beyond the sunny, open floor plan, don’t forget the community pool! You won’t want to miss the convenience of the closeness to the Vienna Metro and Metrobus stop. NO smoking. A small pet will be considered on a case by case basis. LB APP, LB Lease required.
(RLNE2378160) Other Amenities - Balcony.

Description: Right off the Dunn Loring Orange Line Metro in Vienna, Virginia, there's a place that has it all. Halstead Square is a vibrant, pedestrian-friendly neighborhood complete with shops, restaurants, and four distinct, luxury apartment buildings. Ample amenities and apartment homes with uniquely crafted finishes are the perfect place to call home. It?s all that, and then some. THE LOTUS Its unmatched amenities and sophisticated features will take you to distant places. Make your home your getaway. Assume your position at The Lotus. THE LOFTS Raised ceilings. Stylish, high-end spaces. Features and amenities that are notches above the rest. Discover The Lofts. It?s apartment living on a whole other level.

(703) 424-7767 - Sunny Spacious Contemporary with Main Floor Master Suite - Special Japanese Dining Room, 2 fireplaces, library with built-ins, Great Room with 2 story vaulted ceiling. Gleaming Hardwoods, Freshly Painted, New HVAC. Wonderful 1st floor Master suite w/ humongous walk-in closet. Basement has large rec room with wet bar, exercise/craft rooms, tons of storage. Stone patio for outdoor entertaining. On quiet cul-de-sac...great commuting location, close to everything!
